item.description:
The Sages of RPG Gaming Group and Crackskull's Coffee & Books present another Gamenight of epic proportions.

This will be our Second Gamenight at Crackskulls and will be focusing on designer board and card games. With designer board & card games the game designer gets front billing on the box just like the author of a book! We will sample some of the best designer games, and I will bring along some crowd favorites from out last Crackskull's Meetup!

If there is a specific game you would like to know about, or try please let me know and I will do my best to bring it along.

We will be starting the evening at 6:00pm and going until 8:00pm.

Hope you can join us for another fantastic Crackskull's Game Night!

Any Questions please let me know, hope to see you there.

 

Wayne
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the people playing games in the front area.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Boardgame Night at Crackskull's in Newmarket
